content:
this pattern was featured on the back cover of coats & clark s o n t #315 and on the front cover of the workbasket january 1959
**size ** about 11-1/2 inches 29 2 cm in diameter
**materials ** * j & p coats or clark s big ball crochet thread art a 104 or b 34 size 30 1 ball white * milward s steel crochet hook no 10 **publications ** * coats & clark s o n t book no 315 *place mats and doilies in the contemporary manner* 1955 * *the workbasket* volume 22 number 2 november 1956 * *the workbasket* volume 24 number 4 january 1959 #pinwheel
